Chakma Dictionary translates Chakma words in english letters to their corresponding english words. Apart from just translating, it also provides definition of the word along with examples for both the chakma word and the corresponding english word. The purpose of this dictionary application is to preserve the chakma language and help people of the chakma community remain in touch with their language. Many if not most of the students have to go out of state to pursue quality education and because of that they lose touch with their language and community. The gap between the chakma people and their language is increasing and people are slowly starting to forget words that they once knew as a child. We hope that this application will shrink the increasing gap between the chakma people and the chakma language up to some extent and, also help non-chakma people learn chakma words and their meaning.

P.S. : This app is by no means complete. Due to the lack of a physical dictionary with all the chakma words in it, the team itself has to generate the words and add them to the application\'s database slowly. It is a difficult and time consuming task considering the vast number of words. Therefore, we apologize in advance if you encounter any inconvenience with regards to finding words or with other issues. The team will do it\'s best to provide you with the words that you desire to learn
